DashboardPage.Title: Dashboard
DashboardPage.NoKeychipMessage: No available keychips. Your account cannot login on non-whitelisted keychips.
DashboardPage.HasTrustedKeychipMessage: You have set others' keychips as trusted. The holders of these keychips are authorized to log in to your account.
DashboardPage.NoCardMessage: You have not bound any card yet.

HomePage.Title: Home
HomePage.Description: Multipurpose online service for ALL.Net based games
HomePage.FullSupportDesc: We continuously update our services and offer additional support on the portal.
HomePage.LimitedSupportDesc: No related content available on the portal.

SignInPage.Title: Sign in to your account
SignInPage.BindTip: Sign in to link your {{type}} account
SignInPage.LoginFailedMessage: Invalid username/email or password. Please try again.

SignUpPage.Title: Sign up an account
SignUpPage.BindTip: Sign up and link your {{type}} account

NicknameErrors.Minlength: Nickname must be at least 4 characters long.
NicknameErrors.Maxlength: Nickname must be at most 40 characters long.

UsernameErrors.Minlength: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
UsernameErrors.Maxlength: Username must be at most 15 characters long.
UsernameErrors.Pattern: Only letters, numbers, and underscores are allowed.

EmailErrors.Maxlength: Email address must be at most 40 characters long.

VerificationCodeErrors.Length: Verification code must be 8 characters long.

PasswordErrors.Minlength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
PasswordErrors.Maxlength: Password must be at most 100 characters long.

EmailErrors.Maxlength: Email address must be at most 40 characters long.

VerificationCodeErrors.Length: Verification code must be 8 characters long.

PasswordErrors.Minlength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
PasswordErrors.Maxlength: Password must be at most 100 characters long.

ProfilePage.Title: Profile
ProfilePage.UnlinkTip: Are you sure you want to unlink?
ProfilePage.LinkTip: Do you want to link to {{type}} account {{email}}?

CardsPage.Title: Cards
CardsPage.UnbindCardTip: Are you sure to unbind this card?
CardsPage.Warning1: Do not share your access code with anyone or add others' cards as aliases.
CardsPage.Warning2: Due to differences in functionality between card readers and cards, the access code might differ from the printed code on the card. Please follow the guidance on the game's title screen to view the actual access code.
CardsPage.Warning3: You must play at least one game before successfully binding the card.
CardsPage.Warning4: Aliases are used to link multiple cards to the same profile. You need to add access codes that have no play records.

KeychipPage.Title: Keychip
KeychipPage.Lead: Navigating the Use of Keychip IDs
KeychipPage.RemoveMessage: Are you certain you wish to remove this keychip?
KeychipPage.WhitelistTipHeader: I am an Operator or Bot Developer
KeychipPage.WhitelistTipContent: Contact the Administrator to apply for whitelisting
KeychipPage.UntrustMessage: Do you wish to revoke trust in this keychip?
KeychipPage.LeadDesc: In the segatools.ini file, add or modify the following section, replacing the content after 'id' as needed with your keychip ID.
KeychipPage.Warning1: Your card will only be usable on the keychips listed below and those whitelisted on RinNET, to prevent unauthorized access.
KeychipPage.Warning2: Should an attacker gain access to both your keychip ID and your card number, they could manipulate your game data at will. Should you discover a breach, modify them promptly and contact an administrator if loss has occurred.
KeychipPage.Warning3: Do not share it with others if there is no need for them to play on your machine.
KeychipPage.Warning4: Do not add to trust if you do not intend to play on their machine.

BattlePointPage.Title: Battle Point
BattlePointPage.TipLead: Battle score is calculated based on the enemy's level and the damage dealt. Battle points are derived by summing the 12 battle scores and dividing the total by 10,000. This includes:
BattlePointPage.Tip1: Top 3 highest scores from different music track
BattlePointPage.Tip2: Top 3 highest scores for each attribute, excluding the above tracks.

RatingPage.Title: Rating
RatingPage.TipLead: Single track ratings are calculated from fumen constants and scores. Player rating is the average of 55 unique fumen ratings, including:
RatingPage.Tip1: 15 highest ratings from new version fumens
RatingPage.Tip2: 30 highest ratings from old version fumens
RatingPage.Tip3: 10 highest ratings from recent plays, excluding Lunatic difficulty
RatingPage.RatingWarning: The data from your last play doesn't match the server version, so song ratings may be inaccurate.

CardPage.Title: Card
CardPage.Info1: Right click or long touch on the card for details.

SettingsPage.Title: Settings
SettingsPage.Message1: If you wish to revert to an older version of the game after logging in and saving in the new version, you can try modifying the values below.

SettingsPage.Title: Settings
SettingsPage.MessageChangeUserName1: Up to 8 full-width characters excluding special characters
SettingsPage.MessageChangeUserName2: with the following symbols also allowed
SettingsPage.MessageRomVersion: Change only if you have login problem due to rom version
SettingsPage.MessageDataVersion: Change only if you have login problem due to data version

PhotosPage.Title: Game Gallery
PhotosPage.NotOwned: You have not upload any game photo.

DxpassPage.NotOwned: You do not own any deluxe pass.
